articles.description: Nearly three fourths of Earth is covered by oceans, making the planet look like a pale blue dot from space.
articles.content:
Nearly three fourths of Earth is covered by oceans, making the planet look like a pale blue dot from space.
But Japanese researchers have made a compelling case that Earth's oceans were once green, … [+6043 chars]

articles.title: Dissection of 130,000-Year-Old Baby Mammoth Reveals Glimpse Into Lost World - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Making incisions and carefully taking samples, the scientists at a laboratory in Russia's far east looked like pathologists carrying out a post-mortem.
articles.content:
